channel.title: [Insanity] Using one item with another
channel.description:
For example, using a blank ring with a Dragon stone will make a Ring of Wealth.
I did find a tutorial but it wasn't for Project Insanity.
If I could be linked to a tutorial or told how to do it, that would be great. Thankyou.

item.title: [Insanity] Using one item with another
item.dc:creator: @Dannn Dannn
item.description:
@Dannn wrote:

if (itemUsed == 9142 && useWith == 9190 || itemUsed == 9190 && useWith == 9142) { if (c.playerLevel[c.playerFletching] >= 58) { int boltsMade = c.getItems().getItemAmount(itemUsed) > c.getItems().getItemAmount(useWith) ? c.getItems().getItemAmount(useWith) : c.getItems().getItemAmount(itemUsed); c.getItems().deleteItem(useWith, c.getItems().getItemSlot(useWith), boltsMade); c.getItems().deleteItem(itemUsed, c.getItems().getItemSlot(itemUsed), boltsMade); c.getItems().addItem(9241, boltsMade); c.getPA().addSkillXP(boltsMade * 6 * Config.FLETCHING_EXPERIENCE, c.playerFletching); } else { c.sendMessage("You need a fletching level of 58 to fletch this item."); } }

Would this be one?

if ((itemUsed == 1615 && useWith == 1635) || (itemUsed == 1635 && useWith == 1615)) { if (c.playerLevel[c.playerCrafting] >= 55) { c.getItems().deleteItem(1615, c.getItems().getItemSlot(1615), 1); c.getItems().deleteItem(1635, c.getItems().getItemSlot(1635), 1); c.getItems().addItem(2572,1); c.sendMessage("You combine the two materials to create a Ring of Wealth."); c.getPA().addSkillXP(500 * Config.CRAFTING_EXPERIENCE, c.playerCrafting); } else { c.sendMessage("You need a crafting level of 55 to create a Ring of Wealth."); } }

Read full topic

item.title: [Insanity] Using one item with another
item.dc:creator: @Fender94 Fender94
item.description:
@Fender94 wrote:

Go to your UseItem.java, there should be code already in there that you can copy off of and change to your liking.

Read full topic
